DOC.brief_summary: This is a multiple-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single-ascending dose and multiple-ascending dose, adaptive parallel study to investigate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of RO7020322 following oral administration in healthy participants and chronic hepatitis B patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of RO7020322 Following Oral Administration in Healthy Participants and Chronic Hepatitis B Patients
